Articles.Content: Hi all. I'm new to KSP and having trouble with some of the early missions. In the screenshot, I have a 'terrier' haul mission. It seems that I'm meeting every requirement but not getting the last green check. What am I missing here?

Welcome to the forum @Futurtastic, your issue has been moved to gameplay questions. I can see that the speed requirement of the contract is not met but I can't make out the actual parameters (tired old eyes). Could you please post that information?

You have the speed set for orbit. The contracts look at surface speed.

Though for screenshots it is better to go with F1, or the Mac equivalent rather than using a phone. Unless you're on the console version and it's whatever works.

3 hours ago, steuben said:

You have the speed set for orbit. The contracts look at surface speed.

Though for screenshots it is better to go with F1, or the Mac equivalent rather than using a phone. Unless you're on the console version and it's whatever works.

Thank you, that worked. Sorry about the image quality, I am on console version.
